alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Western Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 11 at 10:23PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Bradford, eastern Alachua, northwestern Putnam and western Clay Counties through 1045 PM EST... At 1023 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Starke to near Rochelle. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Western Clay; Western Putnam
